QuestData.Title: Where They Hide
QuestData.Description:
Those sneaky snakes have started to send assassins.
They hide nearby and kill those they cannot take away to the slave pens.
Even the sponges want to be rid of them!
The spores will reveal the naga treachery... and then you can go ahead and kill them.
We must keep our people safe!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Fresh Sponge to reveal and kill $1oa Zanj'ir Assassins.
